intro: Maesa lanyuensis, commonly known as the Lanyu maesa, is a flowering plant native to Taiwan. It belongs to the family Ericaceae and is characterized by its evergreen shrub form. The plant features small, leathery leaves and produces clusters of white or pink flowers. It thrives in humid, shaded environments, typically found in mountainous regions. Due to its limited distribution, it is considered a rare and ecologically significant species.
